panels.title: Uso de CPU ao Longo do Tempo
Uso de Disco ao Longo do Tempo
Uso de Memória ao Longo do Tempo

targets.expr: topk(10, sum by (groupname) (label_replace(rate(windows_process_cpu_time_total{job="windows-servers",hostname=~"$server",process!="Idle"}[5m]) * 100 / on(instance) group_left() (count by (instance) (windows_cpu_core_frequency_mhz{job="windows-servers",hostname=~"$server"}) or count by (instance) (windows_cpu_logical_processors{job="windows-servers",hostname=~"$server"}) or count by (instance) (windows_cs_logical_processors{job="windows-servers",hostname=~"$server"}) or vector(4)), "groupname", "$1", "process", "(.+)")))

label_replace(sum by (process, instance) (rate(windows_process_cpu_time_total{job="windows-servers",hostname=~"$server",process!="Idle"}[5m])) * 100 / on(instance) group_left() (count by (instance) (windows_cpu_core_frequency_mhz{job="windows-servers",hostname=~"$server"}) or count by (instance) (windows_cpu_logical_processors{job="windows-servers",hostname=~"$server"}) or count by (instance) (windows_cs_logical_processors{job="windows-servers",hostname=~"$server"}) or vector(4)), "groupname", "$1", "process", "(.+)")
